testcase.brief: The outside port of Port forwarding nat-policy should be not the used port on br Platform Dependence BR100,BR200,BRAP330,BRAP350
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: 1. Wan interface eth0 get ip on br 2. Nat enable on wan interface 3. Pc1 connect to br lan interface and get lan subnet ip address:192.168.1.11 4. BR100 connect to br lan interface and get lan subnet ip address:192.168.1.10 5. Pc2 connect to external network on br and pc2 can reach br wan interface
Test Procedure: 1. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for ssh tcp on br, the outside port is 22 which is used by ssh on br, check result 1 ip nat-policy ssh type virtual-host inside-host 192.168.1.10 inside-port 22 outside-port 22 protocol tcp 2. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for ssh tcp on br, the outside port is other unused port on br, check result 2 ip nat-policy ssh type virtual-host inside-host 192.168.1.10 inside-port 22 outside-port 222 protocol tcp 3. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for tftp udp on br, the outside port is 23 which is used by telnet on br, check result 1 ip nat-policy tftp type virtual-host inside-host 192.168.1.11 inside-port 69 outside-port 23 protocol udp 4. Configure 1 port forwarding nat policy for tftp udp on br, the outside port is other unused port on br, check result 1 ip nat-policy tftp type virtual-host inside-host 192.168.1.11 inside-port 69 outside-port 233 protocol udp 6. apply the port forwarding nat policy on wan interface interface eth0 mode wan nat-policy ssh interface eth0 mode wan nat-policy tftp 7. pc2 send tcp port 222 connection to eth0 ip address of br, check result3 8. pc2 send udp port 233 connection to eth0 ip address of br, check result4

step.desc: eth0 dhcp
show interface eth0 on BR
get eth0 ip of br
set eth1 and eth4 with access mode
step.telnet: -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable" -v "user-profile fw qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id 1 attribute 1" -v "interface eth4 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth4 mac-learning enable"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
get raw mac of vpc1
get mac of br1.vpc1
br1.vpc4 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc4.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
Create virtual-host ssh nat-policy and the outside-port is used by system,the nat-policy is configured failed and there are some prompt info
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy ssh type virtual-host inside-host ${br1.vpc4.tif.ip} inside-port 22 outside-port 22 protocol tcp" ; exit 0
step.log-match: -i "virtual host port 22 is used by system"

step.desc: Create virtual-host ssh nat-policy
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy ssh type virtual-host inside-host ${br1.vpc4.tif.ip} inside-port 22 outside-port 222 protocol tcp"

step.desc: Create virtual-host tftp nat-policy and the outside-port is used by system,the nat-policy is configured failed and there are some prompt info
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy tftp type virtual-host inside-host ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} inside-port 69 outside-port 67 protocol udp" ; exit 0
step.log-match: -i "virtual host port 67 is used by system"

step.desc: Create virtual-host tftp nat-policy and the nat-policy can be configured successfully
step.telnet: -v "ip nat-policy tftp type virtual-host inside-host ${br1.vpc1.tif.ip} inside-port 69 outside-port 233 protocol udp"

step.desc: bind the nat-policy on wan interface eth0
step.telnet: -v "interface eth0 mode wan nat-policy ssh" -v "interface eth0 mode wan nat-policy tftp" -v "alg tftp enable"

step.desc: check the tftp nat policy and open the debug
step.telnet: -v "show ip nat-policy tftp" -v "_ff id 1 dst-ip ${br1.br.wan.ip} dst-port 233 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"

step.desc: pc2 send udp port 69 connection to eth0 ip address of br
show log buf
the file have been tftp to vpc1 base on the tftp nat-policy ,check the file on vpc1
check the ssh nat policy and open the debug
step.telnet: -v "show ip nat-policy ssh" -v "_ff id 1 dst-ip ${br1.br.wan.ip} dst-port 222 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail"

step.desc: external PC2 can ssh to PC1
show log buf
-clear vpc file
-clear local file
